title: Today the Sky is Blue and White With Bright Blue Spots and a Small Pale Moon and I Will Destroy Our Relationship Today
description: A chapbook of short stories.Richie / Driveway / Go To the Beach / Should / Cancer / Dolphins / Christmas / The Walking Wall / Taipei, Taiwan / Mistake / Robbers / Candace / Drive / Canadian Sandy! You Will Never Read This Story! Good Bye! / The Novelist
author: Tao Lin
